prompt: Design a 'Contact Us' page with a warm beige background (Color(0xFFF5F5F5)) and a cozy, inviting aesthetic. Feature a centered 'Contact Us' title in deep orange (Color(0xFFE64A19)) with a font size of 30 and bold weight. Add a subtitle in dark grey (Color(0xFF424242)) below, encouraging users to reach out. Display three contact methods (Phone: +1 234 567 8900, Email: support@company.com, Address: 456 Main St, City, Country) in vertically stacked cards with a light orange background (Color(0xFFFFCCBC)), elevation 5, and rounded corners (radius 15). Use deep orange icons for phone, email, and location. Below, include a contact form with Name, Email, Subject, and Message fields, using outlined text fields with orange borders and a subtle orange fill (Color(0xFFFFE0B2)). Add a full-width deep orange 'Submit' button. Use padding of EdgeInsets.all(22) and 18 pixels vertical spacing between sections for a warm, approachable Column layout.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Color(0xFFF5F5F5),
      appBar: AppBar(
        backgroundColor: Color(0xFFF5F5F5),
        elevation: 0,
        title: Text(''),
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(22),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Text(
              'Contact Us',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 30,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Color(0xFFE64A19),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            Text(
              'Weâ€™re here to assist you. Drop us a message!',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 16,
                color: Color(0xFF424242),
              ),
              textAlign: TextAlign.center,
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            Card(
              color: Color(0xFFFFCCBC),
              elevation: 5,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(15)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                child: Row(
                  children: [
                    Icon(Icons.phone, color: Color(0xFFE64A19), size: 24),
                    SizedBox(width: 16),
                    Column(
                      crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                      children: [
                        Text('Phone', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold)),
                        Text('+1 234 567 8900', style: TextStyle(color: Color(0xFF424242))),
                      ],
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            Card(
              color: Color(0xFFFFCCBC),
              elevation: 5,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(15)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                child: Row(
                  children: [
                    Icon(Icons.email, color: Color(0xFFE64A19), size: 24),
                    SizedBox(width: 16),
                    Column(
                      crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                      children: [
                        Text('Email', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold)),
                        Text('support@company.com', style: TextStyle(color: Color(0xFF424242))),
                      ],
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            Card(
              color: Color(0xFFFFCCBC),
              elevation: 5,
              shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(15)),
              child: Padding(
                padding: EdgeInsets.all(16),
                child: Row(
                  children: [
                    Icon(Icons.location_on, color: Color(0xFFE64A19), size: 24),
                    SizedBox(width: 16),
                    Expanded(
                      child: Column(
                        crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
                        children: [
                          Text('Address', style: TextStyle(fontWeight: FontWeight.bold)),
                          Text('456 Main St, City, Country', style: TextStyle(color: Color(0xFF424242))),
                        ],
                      ),
                    ),
                  ],
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            Text(
              'Send a Message',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Color(0xFFE64A19),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            TextField(
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Name',
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Color(0xFFFFE0B2),
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19)),
                ),
                focusedBorder: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19), width: 2),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            TextField(
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Email',
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Color(0xFFFFE0B2),
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19)),
                ),
                focusedBorder: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19), width: 2),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            TextField(
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Subject',
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Color(0xFFFFE0B2),
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19)),
                ),
                focusedBorder: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19), width: 2),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            TextField(
              maxLines: 4,
              decoration: InputDecoration(
                labelText: 'Message',
                filled: true,
                fillColor: Color(0xFFFFE0B2),
                border: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19)),
                ),
                focusedBorder: OutlineInputBorder(
                  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  borderSide: BorderSide(color: Color(0xFFE64A19), width: 2),
                ),
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 18),
            SizedBox(
              width: double.infinity,
              height: 50,
              child: ElevatedButton(
                onPressed: () {},
                style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                  backgroundColor: Color(0xFFE64A19),
                  shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                  ),
                ),
                child: Text(
                  'Submit',
                  style: TextStyle(fontSize: 16, color: Colors.white),
                ),
              ),
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
